pkgmetadata.longdescription: Crypt library for DES, MD5, and blowfish. Libxcrypt is a replacement for libcrypt, which comes with the GNU C Library. It supports DES crypt, MD5, and passwords with blowfish encryption.

use.flag: Build with compatibility interfaces for other crypt implementations
Install as system libcrypt.so rather than to an alternate directory (will collide with sys-libs/glibc's version)
Build and install only the headers.
